title: Problems with Fps and loading screen
body:
I play League at 25 - 40 fps, have everything low, no sound and stuff. Everything was going good until Urf this weekend and now every game I play my PC lags so bad I get 5 fps in game.
What's worst, my loading screen takes a lot of time, it not only annoys me but the people I play with, I'd say around 5 minutes it takes to get my champion to load 100%.
I keep on testing on bots but nothing works.
I can't play like this now and I'm not sure if it was for the new patch.
Any help would be very appreciated.

replies.body: You may be having some driver or third party issues, which can cause issues with FPS and a slow-down in rendering the game.  I suggest using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to troubleshoot and tune-up your PC.  If you have Windows 10, I also recommend disabling the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which auto-enabled in a recent update and causing similar issues.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Hm, must be the PC overheating then. I'll send it to clean and see what happens. Thanks for the help Porocles.
